abstract: Sao Paulo Journal; Love motels, popular local term for hotels that specialize in renting rooms for short stays, proliferate in Brazil with 300 alone in Sao Paulo; experts say popularity is driven by need for privacy, escapism, entertainment and fantasy; vast choices spur owners to constantly think up clever marketing ploys such as elaborate theme rooms, helicopter rides, Ferrari drives, private pools with slides and other over-the-top amenities.
lead_paragraph: Motels that rent by the hour have moved beyond ostentatious decorations to embrace services, like helicopter rides and high-end dining, for clients seeking trysts or to spice up their relationships.

headline.main: Intimate Escapes, for a Few Hours, in Brazil’s Love Motels
headline.print_headline: Beyond Beds: Love Motels Add Ferraris and Top Chefs
